title: Uncle Si Was Pranked HARD by a Game Warden
description:
Si gets detained by a game warden and unexpected hilarity ensues. Martin remembers getting the third degree from a Texas game warden. Si hangs out in Nashville with John Schneider and reveals why he won't wear skinny jeans anymore. Stone shares the highlights of their veterans-only hunt. We finally meet Si's buddy Evil Eye. Phil and Miss Kay track down a mystery varmint in their house. And John-David reaches into the mailbag to help a fan figure out what to do with his life.
-
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
